resources.string: Do you want to tell us how you are feeling today?
Choose how often you want to get notifications.
This option affects the battery life (higher frequency = higher battery drain)
Report technical issues or suggest new features
In the last 24 hours I felt on average...
Have you experienced one or more negative events since the last query? How intense was the most significant negative event?
Have you experienced one or more positive events since the last query? How intense was the most significant positive event?
What kind of people are you surrounded by at the moment?
When you think of the people you are surrounded, how does the following statement apply? I do not like these people!
At present I am satisfied with myself
At the moment I consider myself a failure
Since the last query, I have acted impulsively, i.e., I have acted without thinking about possible consequences
Since the last query, I have behaved in an angry or aggressive manner towards another person which I was sorry for afterwards
You can add some notes about your current mood here
